name: Harambe's legacy
description:
This is just a tribute to Harambe.
Years come and go but ideals lives on.

It's been a while since harambe left us. But one only really leave us when he is completely  forgotten....

It's been a long way without you my friend.

One of the first games I ever made back in 2016. Found out the old files and wanted to share this s h i t post of a game.
